gameInfo.controlsInfo: To move as the MovingAvatar, use the four arrow keys to move.

winRules.text: If time reaches 1000 seconds, then you will win.

loseRules.text: If avatar (moving) and hell collide, then the avatar (moving) sprite will be destroyed.
If there are no more avatar (moving) sprites then you will lose.

pointsRules.text: If the avatar (moving) and the honey (Passive) collide, then you will gain 1 point.
